ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Digest Number 347
ygData.msgSnippet: On a scale of 1-10. I will rate it at 8. Outstanding graphics depends on hardware. Cpu, ram and video card. gameplay is interesting with many paths. I finished
ygData.messageBody:
On a scale of 1-10. I will rate it at 8. Outstanding graphics depends on hardware. Cpu, ram and video card.
gameplay is interesting with many paths. I finished one, got 4 more gods with different spells and summons. Summons for creatures. Spells for casting defensive and offensive. all 5 gods have the same main storyline for campaign.
Im using the "Chiong" version aka OEM.
 
Ya awesome gfx!
the s/w comes with an editor too. thats if u like to create new template and stuff
 
 
Regards
Alex
